feed.title: 赵京华个人网页 | Personal page of Jing Hua Zhao
feed.subtitle: Personal page

entry.title: The site now has a QR code.

link.title: The site now has a QR code.

entry.content:
This is generated from https://keremerkan.net/qr-code-and-2d-code-generator/ to embed URL.

See also

  • https://goqr.me/ in simple steps.
  • https://qr.io to enable logo.
entry.summary: This is generated from https://keremerkan.net/qr-code-and-2d-code-generator/ to embed URL.

entry.title: R/tdthap 1.2 is uploaded to CRAN.
entry.content:
Regression of int mkstemp and explicit prototype of asran().

See https://cran.r-project.org/package=tdthap
entry.summary: Regression of int mkstemp and explicit prototype of asran().

entry.title: R/gap 1.3-1 is uploaded to CRAN.
entry.content:
This update compiles with strict function prototyping following a number of additions as in https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gap/ChangeLog.

See https://cran.r-project.org/package=gap
entry.summary: This update compiles with strict function prototyping following a number of additions as in https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gap/ChangeLog.

entry.title: R/gap is updated on CRAN.
entry.content:
It contains many functions from SCALLOP-INF work but the package continues to evolve.

See https://cran.r-project.org/package=gap
entry.summary: It contains many functions from SCALLOP-INF work but the package continues to evolve.

entry.title: pQTLtools is updated!
entry.content:
It seeds the collection of utilities for pQTL analysis.

See https://jinghuazhao.github.io/pQTLtools/
entry.summary: It seeds the collection of utilities for pQTL analysis.

entry.title: shinygap is up!
entry.content:
It allows for interactive query of the three study designs.

See https://jinghuazhao.shinyapps.io/shinygap/
entry.summary: It allows for interactive query of the three study designs.

entry.title: shinySurvival is up!
entry.content:
It allows for user-uploaded data to be analysed and reported.

See https://jinghuazhao.shinyapps.io/shinysurvival/
entry.summary: It allows for user-uploaded data to be analysed and reported.

entry.title: 《统计软件包指南》(1993-1997)
entry.content:
NOTES

Web page: https://jinghuazhao.github.io/en/books

The original html was converted to Markdown and links to ps.gz files were dropped all for clarity.

entry.title: 世界，你好 (Hello, world)!
entry.content:
The jekyll-themed site is up!

The workflow to set up

graph TB;
photo --> |to square + to resize| docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate favicon| docs/assets
docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate SVG + to resize SVG| _includes/logo/logo.svg
painting --> |to crop circle + to generate SVG + to resize SVG| docs/en/*/bees.svg

graph TB;
photo --> |to square + to resize| docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate favicon| docs/assets
docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate SVG + to resize SVG| _includes/logo/logo.svg
painting --> |to crop circle + to generate SVG + to resize SVG| docs/en/*/bees.svg

NOTES

  • 13/12/2022 add-on: Fotor (https://www.fotor.com/)

    a free and great photo editing & graphic design resource that popular among 380 million users from 230 countries.

  • Old page: https://jhz22.user.srcf.net/

  • Image at work
    • To square, https://www.oddprints.com/edit
    • To resize JPG, https://imagemagick.org/index.php
    convert sunflower.jpg -resize 15% sun15.jpg
  • Favicon
    • To generate favicon, https://realfavicongenerator.net/
  • Site logo
    • To generate/resize SVG, https://inkscape.org/
    • To replace logo.svg at assets/image/logo and _includes/svg
  • Project icon
    • To crop circle, https://crop-circle.imageonline.co/
    • To generate SVG, https://inkscape.org/
    • To resize SVG (simpler), https://www.iloveimg.com/resize-image/resize-svg
  • Homepage banner
    • To export JPG (1200dpi), https://www.tracker-software.com/product/pdf-xchange-viewer
    • To crop JPG, mspaint under Windows
    • To generate SVG, https://convertio.co/jpg-svg/
    • To resize SVG (25%), https://www.iloveimg.com/resize-image/resize-svg
(() => console.log('Updated!'))();
entry.summary: The jekyll-themed site is up! The workflow to set up graph TB; photo --> |to square + to resize| docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate favicon| docs/assets docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate SVG + to resize SVG| _includes/logo/logo.svg painting --> |to crop circle + to generate SVG + to resize SVG| docs/en/*/bees.svg graph TB; photo --> |to square + to resize| docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate favicon| docs/assets docs/sunflower.jpg --> |to generate SVG + to resize SVG| _includes/logo/logo.svg painting --> |to crop circle + to generate SVG + to resize SVG| docs/en/*/bees.svg
